cpu.nice.name: cpu.nice
cpu.nice.definition: 处理低优先级进程的CPU时间

iostat.avgqu-sz.name: iostat.avgqu-sz
iostat.avgqu-sz.definition: 是平均请求队列的长度。毫无疑问，队列长度越短越好

iostat.await.name: iostat.await
iostat.await.definition: 每一个IO请求的处理的平均时间（单位是微秒毫秒）。这里可以理解为IO的响应时间，一般地系统IO响应时间应该低于5ms，如果大于10ms就比较大了。这个时间包括了队列时间和服务时间，也就是说，一般情况下，await大于svctm，它们的差值越小，则说明队列时间越短，反之差值越大，队列时间越长，说明系统出了问题。

iostat.r/s.name: iostat.r/s
iostat.r/s.definition: 每秒完成的读 I/O 设备次数

iostat.r_await.name: iostat.r_await
iostat.r_await.definition: 读的IO请求的处理的平均时间

iostat.w_await.name: iostat.w_await
iostat.w_await.definition: 写的IO请求的处理的平均时间

iostat.rkB/s.name: iostat.rkB/s
iostat.rkB/s.definition: 每秒读K字节数。是 rsect/s 的一半因为每扇区大小为512字节

iostat.svctm.name: iostat.svctm
iostat.svctm.definition: 表示平均每次设备I/O操作的服务时间（以毫秒为单位）。如果svctm的值与await很接近，表示几乎没有I/O等待，磁盘性能很好，如果await的值远高于svctm的值，则表示I/O队列等待太长，系统上运行的应用程序将变慢

iostat.w/s.name: iostat.w/s
iostat.w/s.definition: 每秒完成的写I/O设备次数

iostat.wkB/s.name: iostat.wkB/s
iostat.wkB/s.definition: 每秒写K字节数。是 rsect/s 的一半因为每扇区大小为512字节

iostat.wrqm/s.name: iostat.wrqm/s
iostat.wrqm/s.definition: 每秒进行 merge 的写操作数目

iostat.percentage_util.name: iostat.percentage_util
iostat.percentage_util.definition: 在统计时间内所有处理IO时间除以总共统计时间。例如如果统计间隔1秒该 设备有0.8秒在处理IO而0.2秒闲置那么该设备的%util = 0.8/1 = 80%所以该参数暗示了设备的繁忙程度。一般地如果该参数是100%表示设备已经接近满负荷运行了当然如果是多磁盘即使%util是100%因 为磁盘的并发能力所以磁盘使用未必就到了瓶颈

net.sockstat.memory.name: net.sockstat.memory
net.sockstat.memory.definition: 分配给该socket类型的内存大小

proc.meminfo.active.name: proc.meminfo.active
proc.meminfo.active.definition: 活跃使用中的高速缓冲存储器页面文件大小

proc.meminfo.dirty.name: proc.meminfo.dirty
proc.meminfo.dirty.definition: 等待被写回到磁盘的内存大小

proc.meminfo.memavailable.name: proc.meminfo.memavailable
proc.meminfo.memavailable.definition: An estimate of how much memory is available for starting new applications, without swapping. Calculated from MemFree, SReclaimable, the size of the file LRU lists, and the low watermarks in each zone. The estimate takes into account that the system needs some page cache to function well, and that not all reclaimable slab will be reclaimable, due to items being in use. The impact of those factors will vary from system to system.

proc.net.dropped.in.name: proc.net.dropped.in
proc.net.dropped.in.definition: The total number of packets dropped by the device driver.

proc.net.dropped.out.name: proc.net.dropped.out
proc.net.dropped.out.definition: The total number of packets dropped by the device driver.

proc.net.errs.in.name: proc.net.errs.in
proc.net.errs.in.definition: The total number of receive errors detected by the device driver.

proc.net.errs.out.name: proc.net.errs.out
proc.net.errs.out.definition: The total number of transmit errors detected by the device driver.

proc.net.packets.in.name: proc.net.packets.in
proc.net.packets.in.definition: The total number of packets of data received by the interface

proc.net.packets.out.name: proc.net.packets.out
proc.net.packets.out.definition: The total number of packets of data transmitted by the interface

tomcat.jsp.jspCount.name: tomcat.jsp.jspCount
tomcat.jsp.jspCount.definition: The number of JSPs per second that have been loaded in the web module

tomcat.jsp.jspQueueLength.name: tomcat.jsp.jspQueueLength
tomcat.jsp.jspQueueLength.definition: The length of the JSP queue (if enabled via maxLoadedJsps)

tomcat.requests.errorCount.name: tomcat.requests.errorCount
tomcat.requests.errorCount.definition: The number of errors per second on all request processors

tomcat.requests.maxTime.name: tomcat.requests.maxTime
tomcat.requests.maxTime.definition: The longest request processing time (in milliseconds)

tomcat.requests.processingTime.name: tomcat.requests.processingTime
tomcat.requests.processingTime.definition: The sum of request processing times across all requests handled by the request processors (in milliseconds) per second

tomcat.requests.requestCount.name: tomcat.requests.requestCount
tomcat.requests.requestCount.definition: The number of requests per second across all request processors

tomcat.servlet.errorCount.name: tomcat.servlet.errorCount
tomcat.servlet.errorCount.definition: The number of errors per second on all request processors

tomcat.servlet.processingTime.name: tomcat.servlet.processingTime
tomcat.servlet.processingTime.definition: The sum of request processing times across all requests handled by the request processors (in milliseconds) per second

tomcat.servlet.requestCount.name: tomcat.servlet.requestCount
tomcat.servlet.requestCount.definition: The number of requests received by the servlet per second

hadoop.namenode.fsnamesystemstate.NumSta.name: hadoop.namenode.fsnamesystemstate.NumStaleDataNodes
hadoop.namenode.fsnamesystemstate.NumSta.definition: 超时的datanode个数(心跳通信3秒不回复)

hadoop.datanode.fsdatasetstate-null.Rema.name: hadoop.datanode.fsdatasetstate-null.Remaining
hadoop.datanode.fsdatasetstate-null.Rema.definition: datanode 文件系统剩余的容量

hadoop.datanode.activity.VolumeFailures.name: hadoop.datanode.activity.VolumeFailures
hadoop.datanode.activity.VolumeFailures.definition: 单个磁盘簇出错导致服务异常的次数

hbase.regionserver.server.slowAppendCoun.name: hbase.regionserver.server.slowAppendCount
hbase.regionserver.server.slowAppendCoun.definition: Append操作延迟超过阈值的次数

hbase.regionserver.server.slowDeleteCoun.name: hbase.regionserver.server.slowDeleteCount
hbase.regionserver.server.slowDeleteCoun.definition: Delete操作延迟超过阈值的次数

hbase.regionserver.server.slowGetCount.name: hbase.regionserver.server.slowGetCount
hbase.regionserver.server.slowGetCount.definition: Get操作延迟超过阈值的次数

hbase.regionserver.server.slowIncrementC.name: hbase.regionserver.server.slowIncrementCount
hbase.regionserver.server.slowIncrementC.definition: Increment操作延迟超过阈值的次数

hbase.regionserver.server.slowPutCount.name: hbase.regionserver.server.slowPutCount
hbase.regionserver.server.slowPutCount.definition: Put操作延迟超过阈值的次数

kafka.bytesrate.BytesInPerSec.FifteenMin.name: kafka.bytesrate.BytesInPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate
kafka.bytesrate.BytesInPerSec.FifteenMin.definition: Aggregate incoming byte rate in fifteen minute

kafka.bytesrate.BytesOutPerSec.FifteenMi.name: kafka.bytesrate.BytesOutPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate
kafka.bytesrate.BytesOutPerSec.FifteenMi.definition: Aggregate coutcoming byte rate in fifteen minute

kafka.controller.ActiveControllerCount.name: kafka.controller.ActiveControllerCount
kafka.controller.ActiveControllerCount.definition: Number of active controllers in cluster

kafka.server.expand.MeanRate.name: kafka.server.expand.MeanRate
kafka.server.expand.MeanRate.definition: Mean rate at which the pool of in-sync replicas expands

kafka.server.shrink.MeanRate.name: kafka.server.shrink.MeanRate
kafka.server.shrink.MeanRate.definition: Mean rate at which the pool of in-sync replicas shrinks

mysql.innodb.locks.os_waits.name: mysql.innodb.locks.os_waits
mysql.innodb.locks.os_waits.definition: 线程放弃spin wait尝试，直接进入sleep状态的次数

mysql.innodb.locks.spin_waits.name: mysql.innodb.locks.spin_waits
mysql.innodb.locks.spin_waits.definition: 线程尝试获取spin锁而不可得的次数，也就是 spin-wait 的次数

mysql.max_used_connections.name: mysql.max_used_connections
mysql.max_used_connections.definition: 同时使用的连接的最大数目

mysql.queries.name: mysql.queries
mysql.queries.definition: The number of statements executed by the server. This variable includes statements executed within stored programs, unlike the Questions variable. It does not count COM_PING or COM_STATISTICS commands.

mysql.questions.name: mysql.questions
mysql.questions.definition: The number of statements executed by the server. This includes only statements sent to the server by clients and not statements executed within stored programs, unlike the Queries variable. This variable does not count COM_PING, COM_STATISTICS, COM_STMT_PREPARE, COM_STMT_CLOSE, or COM_STMT_RESET commands.

mysql.slow_queries.name: mysql.slow_queries
mysql.slow_queries.definition: Number of queries that took more than long_query_time seconds to execute. Slow queries generate excessive disk reads, memory and CPU usage. Check slow_query_log to find them

mysql.threads_connected.name: mysql.threads_connected
mysql.threads_connected.definition: Number of clients currently connected. If none or too high, something is wrong

mysql.uptime.name: mysql.uptime
mysql.uptime.definition: Seconds since the server was started. We can use this to detect respawns.

yarn.metrics.allocatedMB.name: yarn.metrics.allocatedMB
yarn.metrics.allocatedMB.definition: The amount of memory allocated in MB. If this is closed to totalMB, it is bad

yarn.nodes.usedMemoryMB.name: yarn.nodes.usedMemoryMB
yarn.nodes.usedMemoryMB.definition: The total amount of memory currently used on the node (in MB)

spark.executor.activeTasks.name: spark.executor.activeTasks
spark.executor.activeTasks.definition: Number of active tasks in the application

spark.executor.failedTasks.name: spark.executor.failedTasks
spark.executor.failedTasks.definition: Number of faied tasks in the driver

spark.executor.totalDuration.name: spark.executor.totalDuration
spark.executor.totalDuration.definition: Fraction of time (ms/s) spent by the driver

spark.executor.totalTasks.name: spark.executor.totalTasks
spark.executor.totalTasks.definition: Number of total tasks in the driver

spark.job.numFailedStages.name: spark.job.numFailedStages
spark.job.numFailedStages.definition: Number of failed stages in the application

spark.job.numFailedTasks.name: spark.job.numFailedTasks
spark.job.numFailedTasks.definition: Number of failed tasks in the application's stages

spark.rdd.diskUsed.name: spark.rdd.diskUsed
spark.rdd.diskUsed.definition: Amount of disk space used by persisted RDDs in the application

spark.rdd.memoryUsed.name: spark.rdd.memoryUsed
spark.rdd.memoryUsed.definition: Amount of memory used in the application's persisted RDDs

spark.rdd.numPartitions.name: spark.rdd.numPartitions
spark.rdd.numPartitions.definition: Number of persisted RDD partitions in the application

spark.stage.numActiveTasks.name: spark.stage.numActiveTasks
spark.stage.numActiveTasks.definition: Number of active tasks in the application's stages

spark.stage.numFailedTasks.name: spark.stage.numFailedTasks
spark.stage.numFailedTasks.definition: Number of failed tasks in the application's stages

storm.supervisor.slotsUsed.name: storm.supervisor.slotsUsed
storm.supervisor.slotsUsed.definition: Number of worker slots used on this supervisor

storm.supervisor.usedCpu.name: storm.supervisor.usedCpu
storm.supervisor.usedCpu.definition: Used CPU capacity on this supervisor

storm.supervisor.usedMem.name: storm.supervisor.usedMem
storm.supervisor.usedMem.definition: Used memory capacity on this supervisor

zk_avg_latency.name: zk_avg_latency
zk_avg_latency.definition: zookeeper响应一个客户端请求的平均时间

mongo.network.numRequests.name: mongo.network.numRequests
mongo.network.numRequests.definition: 服务器已收到的不同请求的总数

redis.clients.blocked.name: redis.clients.blocked
redis.clients.blocked.definition: The number of connections waiting on a blocking call

redis.info.latency_ms.name: redis.info.latency_ms
redis.info.latency_ms.definition: The latency of the redis INFO command

redis.mem.used.name: rredis.mem.used
redis.mem.used.definition: Amount of memory allocated by Redis

redis.net.clients.name: redis.net.clients
redis.net.clients.definition: The number of connected clients (excluding slaves)

redis.rdb.changes_since_last.name: redis.rdb.changes_since_last
redis.rdb.changes_since_last.definition: The number of changes since the last background save

redis.slowlog.micros.avg.name: redis.slowlog.micros.avg
redis.slowlog.micros.avg.definition: The average duration of queries reported in the slow log

redis.stats.keyspace_hits.name: redis.stats.keyspace_hits
redis.stats.keyspace_hits.definition: The total number of successful lookups in the db

rabbitmq.queue.consumer_utilisation.name: rabbitmq.queue.consumer_utilisation
rabbitmq.queue.consumer_utilisation.definition: 队列用户中可接收消息的时间比例
